local_intent: Ensure grapes are visible or scanned, then approach and align to the grapes with retries, and verify arrival at the target.
assumptions: Preceding steps have moved the end effector above the grapes for a safe approach
Perception can localize the grapes after scan/detect
coherence_with_global: Matches the global plan around the approach phase: verify/obtain visibility, detect grapes, perform ApproachAndAlign with limited retries, and confirm position before subsequent contact and grasp steps.
